name: The meow of Cat'hulhu
description:
GameJam

This game was submitted to the GameDev.tv GameJam 2022

Theme: DEATH IS ONLY THE  BEGINNING

Source: Github

Description

You are an investigator called to solve a mistery about a death occurred at the University of Wiskatonic. This death, is just the beginning...

Credits
